info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 20 at 5:48PM CDT until September 20 at 6:30PM CDT by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL KANE AND NORTHWESTERN DUPAGE COUNTIES... At 547 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Campton Hills, moving southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Aurora, Naperville, Elgin, Wheaton, Downers Grove, Lombard, Bartlett, Carol Stream, Hanover Park, Addison, Glendale Heights, St. Charles, Glen Ellyn, West Chicago, Batavia, Geneva, Campton Hills, Lisle, Bloomingdale and South Elgin. This includes... Aurora University, Benedictine University, College of DuPage, DuPage County Fairgrounds, Elgin Community College, Fermilab, IL Math and Science Academy, Kane County Cougars Ballpark, Morton Arboretum, Waubonsee Community College, and Wheaton College. Including the following interstates... I-88 between mile markers 105 and 130. I-90 between mile markers 52 and 55. I-355 between mile markers 24 and 29. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
